pkgmetadata.longdescription: Partial Frontier Efficiency Analysis // It calculates the alpha- quantile proposed by Daouia and Simar (2007) doi:10.1016/j.jeconom.2006.07.002 and order-m efficiency score in multi-dimension proposed by Daouia and Gijbels (2011) doi:10.1016/j.jeconom.2010.12.002 and computes several summaries and representation of the associated frontiers in 2d and 3d.
